text: Yeh woh hain jinhen na-haq apnay gharon say nikala gaya sirf unn kay iss qol per ker humara perwerdigar faqat Allah hai. Agar Allah Taalaa logon ko aapas mein aik doosray say na hatata rehta to ibadat khaney aur girjay aur masjiden aur yahoodiyon kay maabad aur woh masjiden bhi dha di jaten jahan Allah ka naam ba-kasrat liya jata hai. Jo Allah ki madad keray ga Allah bhi zaroor uss ki madad keray ga. Be-shak Allah Taalaa bari qooaton wala baray ghalbay wala hai
